title: Can Indian electric two-wheelers challenge China's dominance?
description: India's electric two-wheeler market is booming, but exports remain minimal. Transport Minister Nitin Gadkari sees potential for India to become a top exporter, leveraging its strong presence in foreign markets. Despite challenges like reliance on imported components, local manufacturers are making strides to boost production and export capabilities.
